results.title: Insulin Resistance in Adolescents and Youth With Type 1 Diabetes: A Review of Problems and Solutions
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ adjunct therapy in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1 @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@T1DM@@@ has been shown to improve @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitivity, glycemic control, @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ profile, body composition, vascular smooth muscle function, thereby reducing the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Angiopathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003925 @@@vascular complications@@@, as well as reversal of early @DISEASE_Cerebrovascular_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D002561 @@@vascular dysfunction@@@.

results.title: Metformin suppresses pro-inflammatory cytokines in vitreous of diabetes patients and human retinal vascular endothelium
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@'s possible anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ function in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Angiopathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003925 @@@diabetic vasculopathy@@@, irrespective of @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ control, has garnered considerable study interest.

results.text_hl: However, the role of @GENE_YAP1 @GENE_22601 @@@YAP@@@ in the vasoprotective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Angiopathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003925 @@@diabetic endothelial cell dysfunction@@@ is still unknown.

results.title: Metformin and Angiogenesis in Cancer - Revisited.
results.text_hl: Several clinical studies demonstrated that @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ were less likely to develop @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Angiopathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003925 @@@vascular complications@@@, independent of glycemic control.

results.title: Repaglinide/metformin fixed-dose combination to improve glycemic control in patients with type 2 diabetes: an update
results.text_hl: Lifestyle advice plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is commonly recommended initially to manage @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ and to minimize the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Angiopathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003925 @@@vascular complications@@@.

results.title: Mechanisms of action of metformin in type 2 diabetes and associated complications: an overview.
results.text_hl: This review is mainly devoted to describe the mechanisms of action underlying the antidiabetic effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. Furthermore, we will present evidence for the protective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ against @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@-associated complications mainly @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Angiopathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003925 @@@cerebral and vascular complications@@@.

citations.NLM: Correia S, Carvalho C, Santos MS, Seiça R, Oliveira CR, Moreira PI. Mechanisms of action of metformin in type 2 diabetes and associated complications: an overview. Mini Rev Med Chem. 2008 Nov;8(13):1343-54. PMID: 18991752
